World Court to hear arguments on Israeli occupation of Palestinian territoriesThe United Nations' top court on Monday opens a week of hearings on the legal consequences of Israel's occupation of Palestinian territories, with more than 50 states due to address the judges. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 00:02:30 GMT SI324B4EVFJEDBO5I6TD44KRDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-hear-arguments-israeli-occupation-palestinian-territories-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东
Sydney school, supermarket tainted with asbestos as crisis widensSeven more public sites in Sydney, including a school, sports hub and supermarket, were exposed to asbestos, authorities said on Monday, as the contamination of the toxic material widened and officials rushed to remove it from public spaces. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 22:53:05 GMT 7M3R5L7QAJK5LAB2YXIW5BTB6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sydney-school-supermarket-tainted-with-asbestos-crisis-widens-2024-02-18/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
At least 53 killed in tribal fighting in Papua New Guinea, ABC reportsAt least 53 people were killed in tribal fighting in the northern highlands of Papua New Guinea, Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC) said on Monday, citing local police. Spanish conservatives retain majority in Galicia regional voteSpain's opposition conservative People's Party retained its absolute majority in its stronghold in the northwest region of Galicia on Sunday in a close-run regional election. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 22:39:30 GMT VWY6VPD5QFLCJC3FGAWKZYIBDA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-conservatives-retain-majority-galicia-regional-vote-2024-02-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Ambrey: UK-registered cargo ship reported under attack in Bab al-Mandab StraitBritish maritime security firm Ambrey said on Sunday that a Belize-flagged, UK-registered and Lebanese-operated open hatch general cargo ship reported being under attack in Bab al-Mandab Strait. Norway to facilitate transfer of funds to Palestinian AuthorityNorway has agreed to help facilitate the transfer of frozen tax funds earmarked for the Palestinian Authority (PA) that were collected by Israel, the Norwegian government said on Sunday, providing vital funding to the Western-backed entity. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 21:01:07 GMT MGC7SJZWV5P35NNBOWZ32IGEMA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/norway-facilitate-transfer-funds-palestinian-authority-2024-02-18/Gwladys Fouche世界中东
Mexicans turn out in droves to 'protect democracy' ahead of electionsHuge crowds filled Mexico City's main square on Sunday in support of the nation's electoral authority, accusing President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador of trying to weaken the body ahead of a presidential election in June. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 20:31:27 GMT TW64AZEAPRLYZITBSMF6BHZHUA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexicans-turn-out-droves-protect-democracy-ahead-elections-2024-02-18/Kylie Madry世界美洲

Ukraine accuses Russia of executing injured prisoners at Avdiivka, VeseleUkrainian authorities said on Sunday they had opened an investigation into alleged shootings by Russian forces of six unarmed Ukrainian soldiers in the city of Avdiivka, and two at a village in the same region, after Russia claimed full control of the city.
